bcbioSingleCell 0.1.0
  • Reference

Read Cell Type Markers File

Source: R/readCellTypeMarkers.R

readCellTypeMarkers.Rd

Read Cell Type Markers File

readCellTypeMarkers(file, gene2symbol)

Arguments

file

Gene markers file (CSV or Excel).
gene2symbol

data.frame containing gene-to-symbol mappings. Columns must contain geneID and geneName.

Value

grouped_df, grouped by "cellType" column.

See also

Other Read Functions: loadCellRanger, loadSingleCell

Examples

# Homo sapiens
file <- system.file(
    file.path("extdata", "cell_type_markers.csv"),
    package = "bcbioSingleCell"
)
gene2symbol <- makeGene2symbolFromEnsembl("Homo sapiens")
#> Making GRanges from Ensembl with AnnotationHub 2.10.1 (2017-10-27)
#> id: "AH57757"
#> organism: "Homo sapiens"
#> build: "GRCh38"
#> release: "90"
#> format: "genes"
#> Standardizing the metadata columns
#> Using geneName instead of symbol
#> Setting geneBiotype as factor
#> Setting seqCoordSystem as factor
#> Defining broadClass using: geneName, geneBiotype, seqnames
readCellTypeMarkers(file, gene2symbol = gene2symbol)
#> Reading cell_type_markers.csv
#> Parsed with column specification:
#> cols(
#>   cellType = col_character(),
#>   geneID = col_character(),
#>   geneName = col_character()
#> )
#> # A tibble: 6 x 3
#> # Groups:   cellType [1]
#>   cellType geneID          geneName
#>   <chr>    <chr>           <chr>   
#> 1 B Cell   ENSG00000177455 CD19    
#> 2 B Cell   ENSG00000211895 IGHA1   
#> 3 B Cell   ENSG00000282633 IGHA1   
#> 4 B Cell   ENSG00000211890 IGHA2   
#> 5 B Cell   ENSG00000276173 IGHA2   
#> 6 B Cell   ENSG00000211898 IGHD
